law.text: The department shall annually conduct a performance evaluation of any adult correctional facility for which a private provider has contracted to operate. The department shall make a written report of its findings and submit this report along with any recommendations to the private provider and the Legislative Research Commission.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 70, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1988.
